# Logger.Logs property

Gets the collection of Log Writers that are used to log the Application events.

```csharp
public IList<ILog> Logs { get; set; }
```

## Property Value

An IList&lt;[`ILog`](../../iTin.Logging.ComponentModel/ILog.md)&gt; collection of Log Writers.
